\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
{\binom 00} \&\& {\binom 01} \&\& {\binom 02} \& {\cdots } \& {\binom 0n} \\
{\binom 10} \&\& {\binom 11} \&\& {\binom 12} \& {\cdots } \& {\binom 1n}
\arrow[from=1-1, to=1-3]
\arrow[from=1-1, to=2-1]
\arrow[from=1-3, to=1-5]
\arrow[from=1-3, to=2-3]
\arrow[from=1-5, to=1-6]
\arrow[from=1-5, to=2-5]
\arrow[from=1-6, to=1-7]
\arrow[from=1-7, to=2-7]
\arrow["{\sqcup_{(\Lambda^{n+1}_0)}\Delta^{n+1}}"', dashed, from=2-1, to=2-3]
\arrow["{\sqcup_{(\Lambda^{n+1}_1)}\Delta^{n+1}}"', dashed, from=2-3, to=2-5]
\arrow[dashed, from=2-5, to=2-6]
\arrow[dashed, from=2-6, to=2-7]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
